topline_md: Recent updates from New York City include a suspect sought for a violent rock attack near Hudson Yards, a deadly shooting in the Bronx, and a gas explosion affecting NYCHA tenants, alongside a statewide burn ban due to rising fire risks.

emergencies_risks.title: Emergencies & Risks
emergencies_risks.summary_md:
### Emergencies & Risks
